title: FLCL (Fooly Cooly) Blu-Ray Rip 1080p Dual Audio+Bonus content
description:
Couldn't find this anywhere online anymore, so I've ripped the Blu Ray of FLCL, plus the bonus content from disc 2 (Sorry, but there was no info on what some of the content was, and no subs on the source material I had to work with, so some is named in an, shall we say, unconventional manner).  I'm no pro release group or anything, but I think this looks excellent, with no visible differences from the bluray source, but quite a bit less than the 60GB on the discs.  Keep this seeding, because it's getting hard to find this series anywhere, and this is the only torrent at 1080p.  Oh, and this is also done all kinds of High Profile h264, so no idea if this will play back on your PS3, xbox, phone, or whatever.  Works on a computer, use VLC, but seems to work on everything I've tried.  Also, if anyone has, or would be interested in creating, forced subtitles (i.e., just the untranslated signs and on-screen text), would be eternally grateful, I don't have time.  SEED!!!  And above all, enjoy.

Matroska Container

Codec: h264 (x264 in handbrake)
Horizontal Res: 1920 (Note this is a 4:3 anime, so the black bars on the sides are normal.  Every time you stretch 4:3 to 16:9, god kills a whole BUTTLOAD of kittens.  Probably puppies, too.)
Vertical Res: 1080
